entry.title: Cow Creek Health & Wellness Center Preparing to Open New Pharmacy in Spring 2026
entry.summary: Cow Creek Health & Wellness Center will open a new full-service pharmacy next to its Roseburg clinic in March 2026, offering convenient prescription services for patients and Tribal families as pharmacy options continue to decline in the area.

entry.title: Wreaths Across America returns to remember Douglas County veterans
entry.summary: For over 10 years, U.S. Air Force veteran John Pierson upheld the three core values of Wreaths Across America: Remember, honor, teach. As the annual event returns in 2025, he will be remembered for passing down those values.

entry.title: Three Oregon Forest Operators Named Regional Operators of the Year
entry.summary: Three Oregon forest operators have been named Operators of the Year for exemplary stewardship and compliance with the Forest Practices Act. Honorees from Southwest, Eastern, and Northwest Oregon will be recognized by the Board of Forestry in January.

entry.title: Roseburg Forest Products Shuts Down Weed, California Veneer Plant
entry.summary: Roseburg Forest Products has closed its Weed, Calif., veneer plant, shifting production to Oregon mills as part of a broader restructuring. About 140 employees will receive transition support, and the company says it remains committed to investing in the Weed community.

entry.title: Douglas County Man Sentenced to 14 Years in Federal Prison for Drug Trafficking and Firearms Crimes
